it.apice.sapere.api.management
Interface ReactionManagerObserver

All Known Subinterfaces:
ReactionsScheduler
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultReactionsScheduler, ReactionManagerLogger
public interface ReactionManagerObserver

This is an interface for an entity which wants to observe the ReactionManager behaviour.

Author:
Paolo Contessi

Method Summary
 void ecolawAdded(CompiledEcolaw law)
           Notifies all observers that a new eco-law has been added.
 void ecolawApplied(MatchingEcolaw law, long time)
           Notifies all observers that an eco-law has been applied at a certain local time.
 void ecolawEnabled(MatchingEcolaw law, long time)
           Notifies all observers that an eco-law is going to be applied at a certain local time.
 void ecolawRemoved(CompiledEcolaw law)
           Notifies all observers that an eco-law has been removed.
 

Method Detail

Notifies all observers that a new eco-law has been added.

Parameters:
law - The eco-law

ecolawRemoved

void ecolawRemoved(CompiledEcolaw law)

Notifies all observers that an eco-law has been removed.

Parameters:
law - The eco-law

ecolawEnabled

void ecolawEnabled(MatchingEcolaw law,
                   long time)

Notifies all observers that an eco-law is going to be applied at a certain local time.

Parameters:
law - The eco-law
time - When the eco-law is going to be applied (in milliseconds from epoch)

                   long time)

Notifies all observers that an eco-law has been applied at a certain local time.

Parameters:
law - The eco-law
time - When the eco-law is going to be applied (in milliseconds from epoch)
